name: Retail Banking
description: Consumer-focused services including checking, savings, and personal loans for individuals and small businesses.

name: Corporate Banking
description: Specialized financial services for large corporations, including complex lending, treasury management, and international trade finance.

name: Investment Banking
description: Advisory services for mergers, acquisitions, and capital raising activities, along with securities underwriting and trading.

name: Asset Management
description: Professional management of various securities and assets to meet specified investment goals for clients.

name: Wealth Management
description: Comprehensive financial planning and investment services tailored for high-net-worth individuals and families.

name: Insurance Services
description: Provision of various insurance products, often integrated with banking services to offer comprehensive financial protection.

name: Payment Systems
description: Infrastructure and services facilitating electronic funds transfers, credit card processing, and emerging digital payment technologies.

name: Mortgage Banking
description: Specialized services for originating, selling, and servicing home loans and other real estate-backed financial products.

name: Private Banking
description: Exclusive banking services offering personalized financial solutions and preferential treatment for affluent clients.

name: Commercial Real Estate Finance
description: Specialized lending and advisory services for large-scale commercial property developments and investments.

name: Treasury Services
description: Management of an organization's liquidity, investments, and financial risks, often for corporate and institutional clients.

name: Custodial Services
description: Safekeeping and administration of securities and other financial assets on behalf of institutional investors.

name: Brokerage Services
description: Facilitation of securities transactions for retail and institutional clients, often including research and advisory components.

name: Credit Services
description: Provision and management of various credit products, including credit cards, personal loans, and lines of credit.

name: Islamic Banking
description: Sharia-compliant banking services adhering to Islamic principles, offering unique financial products and investment structures.
